title: Adequate Concept?
content:
Hi people, how are you?

I've created a type and I really love to hear something from you to best learn about what concepts it could serve best!

The link is here:  
 [NewCenturyTypeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140415/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fwww.behance.net/gallery/16887149/Next-Century-Typeface)

I would like to know you opinion, even to maybe create a best apllication for it. I'm not a great type expert so I would like to learn more with you.

Thanks!
author: Simão

comments.content: Sorry, I can't find your typeface. The link doesn't work, so you should post a picture sample of it.
